"Nearby Characters":
"About Nearby Characters

This is a list of characters that are near you. You can invite them to your party, send them Friend Requests, use Team commands, send Trade Requests, view their ARKS cards, block Players, and perform other such operations.

indicates a friend, indicates a fellow Team member and indicates someone who is both your friend and a member of your Team.
